snippet.title: Segasonic The Hedgehog - Attract Mode & Opening Sequence
snippet.description: Here's the config menu, some attract mode, and a look at the opening sequence of the arcade game Segasonic The Hedgehog, which was released only in Japanese arcades. Here's the earliest look at Mighty the Armadillo and even the under-used Ray the Squirrel.
